results.adx_keywords: United States Politics and Government;Presidential Election of 2024;Hutchinson, Asa;Trump, Donald J;Republican Party
results.title: Asa Hutchinson Announces Presidential Bid
results.abstract: The former governor of Arkansas, a prominent Trump critic within the Republican Party, has been testing the waters in Iowa.

media.caption: Voters “are talking about things that matter to them, which is the economy, which is the fentanyl crisis that we have, and the relationship and leadership of America on the world stage,” former Gov. Asa Hutchinson of Arkansas said.

results.adx_keywords: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women);Basketball (College);Clark, Caitlin (2002- );Reese, Angel (2002- );Louisiana State University;Women's National Basketball Assn;University of Iowa
results.byline: By Remy Tumin and Kris Rhim
results.title: Angel Reese, Caitlin Clark and the W.N.B.A.’s Talent Conundrum
results.abstract: Women’s college basketball has never seen the scale of talent it has today. But with only 144 spots in the W.N.B.A., some very bright college stars will have to play elsewhere.

media.caption: Caitlin Clark and Angel Reese will face off Sunday in the women’s basketball N.C.A.A. championship. Both are eligible for the W.N.B.A. draft next year.

results.adx_keywords: United States Politics and Government;Trump, Donald J;Manchin, Joe III;Cassidy, Bill (1957- );Republican Party
results.byline: By Jonathan Swan, Maggie Haberman and Chris Cameron
results.title: 2 Pro-Impeachment Senators Question Motives Behind Trump Indictment
results.abstract: Joe Manchin, a Democrat, and Bill Cassidy, a Republican, both voted to convict Donald Trump after Jan. 6. They expressed concern on Sunday that the criminal case against him is political.

media.caption: Donald J. Trump addressing supporters during a rally in Waco, Texas, last month.
media.copyright: Christopher Lee for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Alligators;St Petersburg (Fla)
results.title: Body of a Missing 2-Year-Old Boy Is Found in an Alligator’s Jaws, Police Say
results.abstract: The discovery was a tragic end to the search for the Florida toddler, who had been missing since Thursday after his mother was found stabbed to death, officials said.

media.caption: The body of Taylen Mosley, a 2-year-old, was found in the jaws of an alligator in Florida after his mother was discovered dead, the police said.

results.adx_keywords: Power Failures and Blackouts;Weather;Deaths (Fatalities);Wind;Tornadoes;Biden, Joseph R Jr;Delaware;East Coast (US);Midwestern States (US);Texas
results.title: Another Round of Severe Storms Expected Tuesday From Texas to Illinois
results.abstract: After a storm system tore through parts of at least seven states on Friday and Saturday, forecasters said tornadoes, hail and strong winds were possible on Tuesday in the South and Midwest.

media.caption: Forecasters have identified two areas of concern for Tuesday: from northeast Texas through Arkansas, and southern Missouri, northern Missouri, southeast Iowa and much of Illinois.
media.copyright: National Weather Service Storm Prediction Center

results.title: He’s Not Jesus, but He Plays Him on TV
results.abstract: For Jonathan Roumie, the star of “The Chosen,” playing the Son of God is an act of faith.

results.adx_keywords: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women);Basketball (College);Coaches and Managers;Clark, Caitlin (2002- );Boston, Aliyah (2001- );Staley, Dawn;University of Iowa;University of South Carolina
results.title: How Iowa Ended South Carolina’s Storied Perfect Season
results.abstract: South Carolina had fielded the nation’s toughest defense, but couldn’t stop the offensive fireworks of Iowa’s Caitlin Clark.

media.caption: “It was kind of just an end of an era, it feels like,” said Aliyah Boston, the South Carolina forward wearing No. 4.
media.copyright: Kirby Lee/Usa Today Sports Via Reuters Con

results.adx_keywords: United States Politics and Government;Ethics and Official Misconduct;Trump, Donald J;Biden, Joseph R Jr;Mar-a-Lago (Palm Beach, Fla)
results.title: Trump Flourishes in the Glare of His Indictment
results.abstract: The former president’s appetite for attention has been fundamental to his identity for decades. Where others may focus on the hazards of a criminal case, he raises money, promotes his campaign and works to reduce the case to a cliffhanging spectacle.

media.caption: Donald Trump addressing supporters during a rally in Waco, Texas, in March.
media.copyright: Christopher Lee for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Exercise;Muscles
results.title: For a Stable, Strong Core, Forget About Crunches
results.abstract: If the goal of your workout is to walk away with a chiseled six-pack, you’re missing the point.

results.adx_keywords: Happiness;Optimism;Politics and Government;Badminton;vis-photo;Finland
results.byline: By Penelope Colston and Jake Michaels
results.title: The Finnish Secret to Happiness? Knowing When You Have Enough.
results.abstract: The Nordic nation has been ranked the happiest country on earth for six consecutive years. But when you talk to individual Finns, the reality is a bit more complicated.

media.caption: Henna and Niklas Hukari, siblings who play badminton in the rural community of Toholampi, are among more than a dozen Finns we spoke with about how optimism manifests in their lives.
media.copyright: Jake Michaels for The New York Times

results.title: Caitlin Clark and Iowa Deliver Toppling Upset of South Carolina in Final Four

results.adx_keywords: Police;School Shootings and Armed Attacks;Covenant School, Nashville, Tenn, Shooting (2023)
results.title: How Nashville Prepared for the Day It Never Wanted to Face
results.abstract: Dispatchers, police and paramedics in Nashville had for years trained for a school shooting as if it was inevitable. An attack in Uvalde, Texas, underscored that there was no margin for error.

media.caption: A reunification area for parents to meet their children was established at a nearby church after a shooting at the Covenant School in Nashville on Monday.
